jd: Hello,I hope this message finds you well.Please give me a call back after your meeting.I am excited to share with you the job description for the .Net Architect position.Based on your background and interests, I believe this role could be a great fit for you.Please find the details of the position below:Position: .Net ArchitectLocation: San Ramon, CA (Hybrid) Job Description:Must have: Need a solid .NET Architect with experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud and AWM experience required (asset and wealth management)Must have played a role of Sr. ArchitectMust have a solid communication to collaboratively drive buildingTarget Architecture of the applicationTech Leadership across Client TeamsBuild a tech roadmap for the productProvide Tech Leadership to the implementation team for migration of D&C’s on-prem EWS application to cloudAWM experience required (asset and wealth management)
